panels.description: RAM (random-access memory) currently in use by the operating system and running applications, in percent.

targets.expr:
((avg by (job) (
  java_lang_memory_heapmemoryusage_used{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (id) (jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"})
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (id) (jvm_memory_used{area="heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"})
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (jvm_memory_pool_name) (jvm_memory_used_bytes{jvm_memory_type="heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"})
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (pool) (process_runtime_jvm_memory_usage_bytes{type="heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"})
))/(avg by (job) (
  java_lang_memory_heapmemoryusage_max{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (id) (jvm_memory_max_bytes{area="heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1)
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (id) (jvm_memory_max{area="heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1)
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (jvm_memory_pool_name) (jvm_memory_limit_bytes{jvm_memory_type="heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1)
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (pool) (process_runtime_jvm_memory_limit_bytes{type="heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1)
))) * 100

panels.title: Memory used(heap)

panels.description: RAM (random-access memory) currently in use by the operating system and running applications, in percent.

targets.expr:
((avg by (job) (
  java_lang_memory_nonheapmemoryusage_used{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (id) (jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="nonheap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"})
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (id) (jvm_memory_used{area="nonheap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"})
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (jvm_memory_pool_name) (jvm_memory_used_bytes{jvm_memory_type="non_heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"})
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (pool) (process_runtime_jvm_memory_usage_bytes{type="non_heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"})
))/(avg by (job) (
  java_lang_memory_nonheapmemoryusage_max{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (id) (jvm_memory_max_bytes{area="nonheap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1)
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (id) (jvm_memory_max{area="nonheap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1)
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (jvm_memory_pool_name) (jvm_memory_limit_bytes{jvm_memory_type="non_heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1)
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (pool) (process_runtime_jvm_memory_limit_bytes{type="non_heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1)
))) * 100

panels.title: Memory used(nonheap)

panels.description: The current number of live threads including both daemon and non-daemon threads.
panels.title: Threads

panels.description: The number of classes that are currently loaded in the JVM.
panels.title: Classes loaded

panels.description: Process uptime.
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Process start time.
panels.title: Process start time

panels.description: System's load average.
panels.title: Load average

panels.description: Process CPU usage.

targets.expr:
avg by (job,instance) (
  rate(java_lang_operatingsystem_processcputime{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
)
/1000000000 * 100
or
avg by (job,instance) (
  process_cpu_usage{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} * 100
)
or
avg by (job,instance) (
  process_runtime_jvm_cpu_utilization_ratio{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} * 100
)
or
avg by (job,instance) (
  rate(process_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]) * 100
)

panels.title: CPU usage (process)

panels.description: Process resident memory size in bytes.
panels.title: Process memory used (rss)

panels.description: Process files opened.
panels.title: Process files open

panels.description: The used space is the amount of memory that is currently occupied by Java objects.

targets.expr:
avg by (job) (
  java_lang_memory_heapmemoryusage_max{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (id) (jvm_memory_max_bytes{area="heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1)
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (id) (jvm_memory_max{area="heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1)
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (jvm_memory_pool_name) (jvm_memory_limit_bytes{jvm_memory_type="heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1)
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (pool) (process_runtime_jvm_memory_limit_bytes{type="heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1)
)

panels.title: JVM memory used(heap)

panels.description: The amount of memory that is currently in non-heap.

targets.expr:
avg by (job) (
  java_lang_memory_nonheapmemoryusage_max{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (id) (jvm_memory_max_bytes{area="nonheap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1)
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (id) (jvm_memory_max{area="nonheap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1)
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (jvm_memory_pool_name) (jvm_memory_limit_bytes{jvm_memory_type="non_heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1)
)
or
avg by (job) (
  sum without (pool) (process_runtime_jvm_memory_limit_bytes{type="non_heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1)
)

panels.title: JVM memory used(nonheap)

panels.description: Memory used for G1 Eden Space Collection.
panels.title: Eden Space (used)

panels.description: Memory used for Survival collection.

targets.expr:
avg by (job) (
  jvm_memory_limit_bytes{jvm_memory_pool_name=~"(G1 |PS )?Survivor Space", jvm_memory_type="heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1
)
or
avg by (job) (
  jvm_memory_max{id=~"(G1 |PS )?Survivor Space", area="heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1
)
or
avg by (job) (
  jvm_memory_pool_max_bytes{pool=~"(G1 |PS )?Survivor Space", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1
)
or
avg by (job) (
  process_runtime_jvm_memory_limit_bytes{pool=~"(G1 |PS )?Survivor Space", type="heap", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"} != -1
)

panels.title: Survival space (used)

panels.description: Memory used for Tenured(Old Gen) collection.
panels.title: Tenured space (used)

panels.description: Major and minor garbage collections

targets.expr:
avg by (job,gc) (
  rate(jvm_gc_collection_seconds_count{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
)
or
avg by (job,jvm_gc_action,jvm_gc_name) (
  rate(jvm_gc_duration_seconds_count{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
)
or
label_replace(
  avg by (job,action,cause) (
  rate(jvm_gc_pause_count{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
)
, "action", "$1", "action", "end of (.+)")
or
label_replace(
  avg by (job,gc,action) (
  rate(process_runtime_jvm_gc_duration_seconds_count{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
)
, "action", "$1", "action", "end of (.+)")

panels.title: Garbage collections

panels.description: Major and minor garbage collections

targets.expr:
avg by (job, gc) (
  rate(jvm_gc_collection_seconds_sum{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
  /
  rate(jvm_gc_collection_seconds_count{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
)

or
label_replace(
  avg by (job, action, cause) (
  rate(jvm_gc_pause_sum{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
  /
  rate(jvm_gc_pause_count{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
)

, "action", "$1", "action", "end of (.+)")

label_replace(
  avg by (action,cause, job) (rate(jvm_gc_pause_max{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))
, "action", "$1", "action", "end of (.+)")

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(jvm_gc_duration_seconds_bucket{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le,job,jvm_gc_action,jvm_gc_name))

or
label_replace(
  histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(process_runtime_jvm_gc_duration_seconds_bucket{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le,job,action,gc))

, "action", "$1", "action", "end of (.+)")

panels.title: GC duration

panels.description:
'Allocated' is the size increase of the young generation memory pool after one GC and before the next. It reflects minor GC.
'Promoted' is the size increase of the old generation memory pool after GC. It reflects full GC.

targets.expr:
avg by (job) (
  rate(jvm_gc_memory_allocated{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
)
or
avg by (job) (
  rate(jvm_memory_pool_allocated_bytes_total{pool=~"(G1 |PS )?Eden Space",job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
)

panels.title: Allocated/promoted

panels.description: The current number of live threads including both daemon and non-daemon threads.
panels.title: Threads

panels.description: Threads by current state.

targets.expr:
sum by (jvm_thread_state, jvm_thread_daemon, job) (jvm_thread_count{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"})
or
sum by (state, job) (jvm_threads_states{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"})
or
sum by (state, job) (jvm_threads_state{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"})

panels.title: Threads states

panels.description: Direct buffer is allocated outside the Java heap and represents the OS native memory used by the JVM process. It is generally used for I/O operations. Note that direct buffers aren't freed up by GC.
panels.title: Direct buffer used bytes

panels.description: The mapped buffer pool is used for its FileChannel instances.
panels.title: Mapped buffer used
